title: Add Terms of Service page and navigation after Payment Method

requirements.summary: Create a new Terms of Service page with an accessible /tos route rendered inside the existing SiteLayout, using English legal content styled consistently with existing Minecraft-themed UI.
acceptanceCriteria: A new page component exists at a non-immutable path under frontend/src/pages (e.g., TermsOfServicePage.tsx or TosPage.tsx).
App routing includes a new route for the TOS page (e.g., path "/tos") and it renders inside the existing SiteLayout.
The TOS page content is written in English and is readable (clear headings/sections) with styling consistent with the existing Minecraft-themed cards/typography used across other pages.

file_operations.description: Add a new TermsOfServicePage that renders a clear English Terms of Service structure (e.g., Introduction, Eligibility, Accounts, Payments/Refunds reference, Acceptable Use, UGC, Service Availability, Termination, Disclaimers, Limitation of Liability, Changes, Contact) using existing mc-card / minecraft-text styling patterns and MotionInView for consistent animated sections. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Register a new TanStack Router route for the TOS page at path "/tos" (as a child of the root route so it renders within SiteLayout), and import the new TermsOfServicePage component. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add a prominent next-step CTA on the Payment Method page that navigates to the new /tos route without altering existing content.
acceptanceCriteria: The Payment Method page includes a visible call-to-action near the bottom (after the existing sections) that navigates to the TOS route when clicked.
Navigation uses TanStack Router <Link> (consistent with the rest of the app) and works on both desktop and mobile.
No existing Payment Method content is removed or broken.

file_operations.description: Append a new bottom section (after the existing payment/security content) containing a prominent CTA that uses TanStack Router Link to navigate to "/tos"; use the shadcn-ui Button (existing app pattern) for prominence while keeping all current sections intact. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Expose the Terms of Service route in shared marketing navigation and footer link lists so it appears after Payment Method and is discoverable from the footer.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/content/marketingContent.ts includes a new navigation entry for the TOS route placed immediately after the existing "/payment" entry.
Footer link lists (from marketingContent.footer.*Links) include a Terms of Service entry pointing to the TOS route (placement consistent with existing categories).
Top navigation renders the new Terms of Service link without layout issues in desktop and mobile menus.

file_operations.description: Add a new navigation item { path: "/tos", label: "Terms of Service" } immediately after the existing "/payment" entry, and add a corresponding footer link (e.g., in companyLinks near Payment) pointing to "/tos" so TopNav and Footer render it automatically from shared data. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
